title: Substitute and Solve for c
text:
Substitute $$h=860$$ into one of the original equations and solve for c.
$$2h+3c=4720$$
$$2	imes860+3c=4720$$
$$1720+3c=4720$$
$$c=1000$$
speech:
Substitute  h is equal to 860  into one of the original equations and solve for c.
 2 h, plus 3 c is equal to 4720 
 2 times 860 plus 3 c is equal to, 4720 
 1720, plus 3 c is equal to 4720 
 c, is equal to 1000

title: Amount of Sodium
text: There is $$1000$$ mg of sodium in a cup of cotage cheese.
